title: Apache Cassandra ™️ Trends with Aaron Ploetz | Ep. 100 Distributed Data Show
description: This week, Aaron Ploetz joins Eric Zietlow to discuss trends within Apache Cassandra and gives us a few resources on how to learn C*.
